```{r}
library(tidyverse)
options(tibble.print_min = 5)
```

```{r}
subway = 
  subway_data=
  read.csv("./NYC_Subway.csv") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  select(line, station, latitude, longitude, route, entrance, entry, vending, ADA, starts_with("Route")) %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    route1:route11,
    names_to = "route", 
    values_to = "number") %>% 
  mutate(route = recode(route, "route1" = 1, "route11" = 11))
  mutate(entry = recode(entry, `Yes` = "True", `No` = "False"))
```
